column4: so, am I allowed to use msttcorefonts for commercial purposes or not?
you may download msscorefonts package and check its license in the README.TXT
I read it and the included EULA for msttfcorefonts, but it doesn't really make it clear to what I can do with it.
and its not clear for me too lol may be you should consult a lawyer

You may install and use an unlimited number of cop
